sentences.en: Ahmed then took me for a drive outside Turpan to a small Uyghur village at the foot of a mountain where I could see their style of housing, farming, etc.
sentences.cn: 然后，艾哈迈德载我去吐鲁番郊外的、山脚下的一个维族小村庄，在那我可以看到他们的建筑风格，以及农事等等。

sentences.en: Excessive heat and unusual topographical features make the Turpan Basin the locale of many interesting happenings.
sentences.cn: 吐鲁番奇热的气候,奇特的地形,包蕴着许多奇异的趣事.

sentences.en: In Turpan, there are a lot of bazaars, selling succulent fruits, colorful carpets and turbans.
sentences.cn: 在吐鲁番, 有许多集市, 卖美味多汁的水果 、 色彩鲜艳的地毯和头巾.

sentences.en: So in Turpan depression there exist two petroleum systems: J 1 + 2 - J 2 (! )
sentences.cn: 据此,吐鲁番坳陷存在两个含油气系统: J1+2 - J2 (! )

sentences.en: Taibei Say was the depositional center of Turpan - Harmi Basin after Jurassic.
sentences.cn: 台北凹陷在侏罗纪以后成为吐哈盆地的沉积中心.

sentences.en: The sag a secondary sag on the north dip slop of Turpan - Harmi Basin since Late Permian.
sentences.cn: 晚二叠世以来,台南凹陷为吐哈盆地北倾斜坡上的次一级凹陷.

sentences.en: There are no large slipping nappe structure belts on the north depression in the Turpan - Hami basin.
sentences.cn: 吐哈 盆地北部凹陷不存在大型盖层滑脱型推覆构造带.

sentences.en: Turpan - Hami ( Tuha ) basin is deemed to be a typical coal - formed oil basin.
sentences.cn: 吐哈 盆地被认为是典型的煤成油盆地.

trans.tran_cn: 吐鲁番（新疆维吾尔自治区）（旧译Turfan）
